long_description: Not sure what the temps will be like tomorrow? No worries. Swix Universal Temperature wax delivers reliable glide in all snow conditions. Universal hydrocarbon wax is designed to work in all snow conditions and can be applied by simply rubbing it on and polishing. Or, for best performance, iron in the wax, scrape and brush, giving your skis a smooth finish for excellent glide.
short_description: Not sure what the temps will be like tomorrow? No worries. Swix Universal Temperature wax delivers reliable glide in all snow conditions.
